div.h2: Virginia Department of Health has started indicating COVID-19 cases by locality on their webpage along with lots of other great information. Stay informed with facts. http://www.vdh.virginia.gov/surveillance-and-investigation/novel-coronavirus/

div.class: inner col col18 first last idb141f326-d720-40b6-b6d6-4e59a98fa05b
inner col col18 first last id625183d7-516a-462d-ba66-0b1f8fcf959a

h4.a: Powhatan County Declares Local State of Emergency

li.div: Powhatan County joins Richmond, Hanover, Henrico, Chesterfield and Goochland in declaring a Local State of Emergency. This will allow the County to move more swiftly in putting resources towards the issue, should they become needed in the future.

h4.a: Xfinity Offers Free WiFi Hotspot Access

li.div: Xfinity will be free for the next 60 days. Read on...

h4.a: COMCAST ANNOUNCES COMPREHENSIVE COVID-19 RESPONSE TO HELP KEEP AMERICANS CONNECTED TO THE INTERNET

li.div: Comcast today announced additional steps to help ensure people stay connected to the internet as more schools suspend classes and companies encourage employees to work from home due to the Coronavirus. More info....
